coreAtributes.name: Enforcer Pants
coreAtributes.description: A pair of tactical pants used by Enforcers

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your leg armor.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s leg armor and roughly pull it off [npc.her] legs.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your leg armor and roughly pulls it off your legs.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s armor and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her] legs.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on your leg armor.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s [npc.legs] through their armor as you pull it onto [npc.herHim].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull up [npc.her] pants, before securing the cuisse onto [npc.her] legs.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your [pc.legs] through your pants, before securing the cuisse.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces on your pants, before restapping the metal cuisse tightly.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s [npc2.legs] through their pants before securing the cuisse onto [npc2.her] legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pull up [npc2.her] pants, before securing the cuisse onto [npc2.her] legs.

displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly unzip [npc.her] enforcer pants.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly unzip your enforcer pants.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly unzip [npc2.her] enforcer pants.

replacementText.playerSelf: You zip up your enforcer pants.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly zip up [npc.her] enforcer pants.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly zips up your enforcer pants.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly zips up [npc2.her] enforcer pants.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull down your enforcer pants.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly pull down [npc.her] enforcer pants.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly pulls down your enforcer pants.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly pulls down [npc2.her] enforcer pants.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull up your enforcer pants.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and roughly pull up [npc.her] enforcer pants.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and roughly pulls up your enforcer pants.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and roughly pulls up [npc2.her] enforcer pants.
